tool_description: Exports growth tracking data in various formats for backup, sharing with healthcare providers, or importing into other systems.

date_range_start.description: Start date for data export range

date_range_end.description: End date for data export range

error_messages: Invalid export format: Must be 'CSV', 'PDF', or 'JSON'.
Invalid date range: End date must be after start date.
No data found: No growth data exists for the specified child and date range.
Child not found: The specified child_id does not exist in the system.
usage: Specify child ID and export format. Optionally set date range and include charts. The tool exports all relevant growth data in the requested format.

file_size_kb.description: Size of the exported file in kilobytes

records_exported.description: Number of measurement records included in export
